metadata.notes: This template provides examples of how to structure compatibility information for AWS Graviton processors

software_compatibility.name: nginx
software_compatibility.description: High-performance HTTP server and reverse proxy

supported_versions.notes: Full Graviton support with optimized performance
supported_versions.performance_notes: Native ARM64 builds available, excellent performance on Graviton

supported_versions.notes: Compatible but performance optimizations available in newer versions
supported_versions.performance_notes: Works well but lacks some ARM64-specific optimizations

compatibility.migration_notes: Consider enabling specific Graviton optimizations in configuration. Update to latest stable version for best performance.

supported_versions.notes: Full Graviton support with native ARM64 builds
Compatible but newer versions recommended for better performance
supported_versions.performance_notes: Good performance but lacks some ARM64 optimizations

supported_versions.notes: End of life versions, upgrade required

compatibility.migration_notes: Python 3.8+ recommended for optimal Graviton performance. Ensure all dependencies are ARM64 compatible.

supported_versions.notes: Full Graviton support with ARM64 optimizations
supported_versions.performance_notes: Native ARM64 builds with excellent performance

supported_versions.notes: Compatible but upgrade to 8.0+ recommended for better Graviton performance
supported_versions.performance_notes: Good performance but lacks ARM64-specific optimizations

supported_versions.notes: End of life versions, upgrade required for security and compatibility

compatibility.migration_notes: MySQL 8.0+ provides significant performance improvements on Graviton. Plan for upgrade path from 5.7 to 8.0.

supported_versions.notes: Full Graviton support with excellent performance
supported_versions.performance_notes: Native ARM64 builds available, optimized for Graviton

supported_versions.notes: Compatible but newer versions provide better performance on ARM64
supported_versions.performance_notes: Works well but lacks some ARM64 optimizations

supported_versions.notes: Very old versions, upgrade strongly recommended

compatibility.migration_notes: Redis 6.0+ recommended for optimal Graviton performance. Consider Redis 7.0 for latest features and performance improvements.

software_compatibility.name: nodejs
software_compatibility.description: JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine

supported_versions.notes: Full Graviton support with native ARM64 builds
supported_versions.performance_notes: Excellent performance on Graviton with V8 ARM64 optimizations

supported_versions.notes: Compatible but upgrade recommended for better ARM64 support
supported_versions.performance_notes: Good performance but newer versions have better ARM64 optimizations

supported_versions.notes: End of life versions, upgrade required

compatibility.migration_notes: Node.js 14+ recommended for Graviton. LTS versions (16.x, 18.x) provide best stability and performance.

software_compatibility.name: example-incompatible-software
software_compatibility.description: Example of software with no Graviton support

compatibility.migration_notes: This software does not support ARM64/Graviton architecture. Consider alternative solutions or contact vendor for ARM64 support roadmap.

alternatives.name: modern-alternative
alternatives.description: A modern alternative with full Graviton support

version_range_examples.description: Examples of supported version range formats

examples.description: Greater than or equal to version 1.0.0
Less than or equal to version 2.0.0
Greater than or equal to 1.0.0 AND less than 2.0.0
Any version - used when specific version information is not available

status_definitions.compatible: Software version is fully compatible with Graviton processors
status_definitions.compatible_with_notes: Software version works on Graviton but may have limitations or performance considerations
status_definitions.incompatible: Software version is not compatible with Graviton processors
status_definitions.unknown: Compatibility status is not known or has not been tested
